keyboard_check: With this function you can check to see if a key is held down or not. Unlike the keyboard_check_pressed() or keyboard_check_released() functions which are only triggered once when the key is pressed or released, this function is triggered every step that the key is held down for. The function will take a keycode value as returned by the function ord() (only capital letters from A-Z or numbers from 0-9), or any of the vk_* constants listed on the main Keyboard Input page.
